languages.text:
All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's pushing attacks deal +300% more damage.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

languages.text:
当这把雷霆锤{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}目标时，造成的所有碰撞{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高300%。
所有被这把雷霆锤{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标，都需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，否则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text:
All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
当这把雷霆锤推动目标时，造成的所有碰撞伤害提高300%。
所有被这把雷霆锤{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}的目标，都需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，否则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态。

languages.text:
サンダーハンマーの{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}押しのけ{/g}攻撃による全ての衝突は+300% の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
このサンダーハンマーが{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した全てのターゲットは、+10の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}付きの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格するか、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
languages.original_text:
All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サンダーハンマーの押しのける攻撃による全ての衝突は、さらに300％のダメージを与える。
このサンダーハンマーが{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した全てのターゲットは、10の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}付きの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格しなければ{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。

languages.text:
При {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивании{/g} целей громовым молотом {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от столкновений увеличивается на 300%.
Все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.
languages.original_text:
All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
При отталкивании целей громовым молотом урон от столкновений увеличивается на 300%.
Все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадания{/g}, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.

При отталкивании целей громовым молотом урон от столкновений увеличивается на 300%.
Все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадания{/g}, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.

languages.text:
Todas las colisiones de los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuje{/g} del martillo de trueno infligen un +300 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
Todos los objetivos que reciben el {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de este martillo de trueno deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.
languages.original_text:
All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Todas las colisiones de los ataques de empuje del martillo de trueno infligen un +300 % de daño.
Todos los objetivos que reciben el {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} de este martillo de trueno deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.

languages.text:
Alle Kollisionen, die durch die {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}Stoß{/g}angriffe des Energiehammers verursacht werden, verursachen +300 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
Alle Ziele, die von diesem Energiehammer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen werden{/g}, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 bestehen, sonst werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
languages.original_text:
All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Alle Kollisionen, die durch die stoßenden Angriffe des Energiehammers verursacht werden, verursachen +300 % mehr Schaden.
Alle Ziele, die von diesem Energiehammer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} werden, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 bestehen, sonst werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.

languages.text:
Toutes les collisions provoquées par les attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}poussée{/g} du marteau Thunder infligent +300 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
Toutes les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par ce marteau Thunder doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
languages.original_text:
All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Toutes les collisions provoquées par les attaques de poussée du marteau Thunder infligent +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Toutes les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchées{/g} par ce marteau Thunder doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
